title: Trump Says US ‘Going to Run’ Venezuela Until Transition Possible
description: President Donald Trump said the US is “going to run the country until such time as we can do a safe, proper and judicious transition.” Trump spoke Saturday after US forces captured Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro and his wife in an early morning raid. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: President Donald Trump said the US is “going to run the country until such time as we can do a safe, proper and judicious transition.” Trump spoke Saturday after US forces captured Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro and his wife in an early morning raid. (Source: Bloomberg)
